channel.title: gristlepod site updates
channel.description: gristlepod is an illustrator and developer residing in the github hosting space. this feed records sitely updates and personal logging.

item.title: 2025.2.06 // "Refléter Op. 6", RSS feed applied
item.description:
several graphic changes were applied to the site and some directories were recategorized for the following update. i've set up two rss feeds respectively for my personal blog and store. the landing page will now display the newest posts of both feeds.

posted an identity v fanfiction "Refléter Op. 6" that i've written some time ago in personal log > fanfiction

item.title: 2025.01.16 // updated commission TOS and ko-fi mirror
item.description: if you want to support me, i've got all the kinks in my art brand worked out for future clients/buyers.

item.title: 2024.12.22 // spreadsheet redeco
item.description: touched up the music page and sorted my spreadsheet archive to be used globally rather than page by page. cleaned up luchino's shrine.

item.title: 2024.11.03 // 0ekekddddd ==> gristlepod@github
item.description: working towards a more streamlined brand, and having to spell "0ekekddddd" out loud at meetups gets embarrassing. url change enacted. also, i made a bluesky.

item.title: 2024.10.07 // handinavi prototype completion
item.description: uploaded some pictures of the handinavi prototype.

item.title: 2024.09.21 // openmpt guide
item.description: i made some custom sounds for my cyberdeck and i felt inspired to do a quick write on such processes.

item.title: 2024.09.06 // church of luchino
item.description: i was inspired to create an online shrine for all things luchino-related overnight. performed some minor site cleanup.

item.title: 2024.08.24 // general website-itry
item.description: site changes are officially being recorded... i might have waited too long to do this ever since the host switch. a brand new sitewide layout graphic has been applied for the special occasion, but i'll keep using the old one for the blog. regarding ko-fi i've come across issues with overseas sales, so i'll issue a list of countries i can't ship to internationally in the upcoming commission TOS.
